page.syntax: Group_List as C = a5_get_groups([C master_password [,L lBuiltIn ]])

argument.name: master_password
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of defined groups.

argument.name: lBuiltIn
argument.description: Logical. Optional. If you are not logged in as the administrator, you must supply the administrator password.

page.description: Gets the names of all groups. Returns a crlf delimited list. If you are not logged on as the Administrator, then you must supply the master password.
page.discussion: If you have set up Users and Groups for a Database through the Tools > Security commands, the A5_GET_GROUPS() function returns names of all the groups that have been defined. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
page.example: ? a5_get_groups() = Documentation Engineering Customer Support Sales
